summary.description:
Regional Imaging Genetic Enrichment Analysis.

RIGEA is an R software tool for performing regional imaging genetic enrichment analysis.

Please cite the following paper.

Results: In this paper, we propose a flexible and powerful framework for mining regional imaging genetic associations via voxelwise enrichment analysis, which embraces the collective effect of weak voxel-level signals and integrates brain anatomical annotation information.
